title: Patna Triple Murder News: Three Shot Dead, One Injured During Clash Between Two Groups In Fatuha
selftext: Bihar is again infested with crimes and criminals. Guess the casteist and fundamentalists of Bihar, specially the core vote banks of RJD are happy with how the state is reversing back to 90s jungle raj.
